resources.string: The app requires permissions to work

"Instructions for alpha testing:
1. Install a nostr client (i.e. Amethyst)
2. Install a local relay (i.e. Citrine)
3. Connect your client to your local relay
4. Turn off internet in any number of devices
5. Start Samiz (do it now for real time sync testing or after step 6 for Negentropy testing)
6. Write a note in your offline device

Note: This version works with a mesh of any number of devices"
Samiz can\'t work with bluethoot disabled.
To keep the Bluetooth connection stable, please disable battery optimization for Samiz.
